meanings.definition: The state of lacking a head.
meanings.sent1: The headlessness of the statue made it look incomplete.
meanings.sent2: The headlessness of the chicken was a result of the unfortunate accident.
meanings.sent3: The headlessness of the snowman was a comical sight in the yard.
meanings.sent4: The headlessness of the situation left everyone confused and directionless.
meanings.sent5: The headlessness of the mannequin made it eerie and unsettling in the dimly lit store.

meanings.definition: The quality of being without a head.
meanings.sent1: The headlessness of the ghostly figure sent shivers down my spine.
meanings.sent2: The headlessness of the doll was a deliberate design choice by the artist.
meanings.sent3: The headlessness of the robot toy made it seem futuristic and unique.
meanings.sent4: The headlessness of the organization's leadership led to chaos and confusion.
